content.detailedDescription:
I glanced at a star while outside on my deck.  it appeared to move slightly so i looked directly at it.  i moved so that i could line it up against a stationary object nearby (tree branch) and realized that it was indeed moving slightly.  it seemed to move in a circular motion, stop, then move along a straight linear path in a westward direction, it reminded me of how a water bug glides across the survace of the water, but it was a slow movement.  it did this repeatedly like a pattern so i assumed it was just a satellite.  i looked directly up and did notice a satellite in a nother part of the sky (south heading north) and noticed it had a continual movement across the sky (did not pause or waver in its path at all) and looked much duller and farther away.  i looked back too the other light and noticed it was still there, following the same pattern i observed previously.  i have no idea how far away it was or how big/small it was as it appeared just like a star and it was a clear night.  it was yellow/orange/white and "twinkled" just like a star as well.  i went inside after watching it for a few minutes and nothing changing.  an hour later i went outside again and it was still in the sky but much further to the west and at more of a 50-60degree angle to the horizon instead of a 70-80degree from where i first saw. it did not seem to decend or ascend or change it's pattern, just continued on across the sky in a straight line (except for when it paused and moved in the circular motion). 
i'm just curious as to what this could be.
content.summary: Appeared to be a star but noticed subtle movements westward

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was preforming the duties of my job which require me to be outside patrolling at night. i happened to look up (as i like looking at the stars) and i saw 3 red-orange orbs that were then joined by a 4th of the same color and approximately the same size. at first i thought maybe they were stars or meteorites but they where first off moving and then also moving to slowly. i saw them in the sky down the street from where i was and the lights moved toward where i was but not "at" me. you could hear a slight whirring noise as they got closer but they were not planes. the lights almost resemble fire but not really. they were moving over the highway from the direction of wimberly, texas very slowly when they were almost over the complex i work at they stopped, hovered a moment and then continued moving slowly toward seguin, texas ( i think that is east to west...Not really good at the cardinal directions haha). when they were above the complex i work at/ field next the the complex they just disappeared like they were never there. one of the lights did sort of fade come back and then disappear but the others were just gone and the noise with them! although i am curious about what they were i dont really care...It was exciting. i ran to try to get my family but the lights were gone before they came out. several people stopped at our complex squealing and yelling excitedly "did you see that? did you see that? what were they?" another person said that people were stopped in the street in town trying to take videos and photos...He said they wouldnt come out on his own camera and my phone wasnt strong enough to pick them up as i have an older phone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 red-orange glowing orbs moving in sky, hovered then moved again, from wimberly texas area toward seguin texas area, disappeared in sky directly above where i and others stood watching!

content.detailedDescription: Cannot recall event at this time. all information is taken from the video. around 18 lights can be seen appearing and disappearing in different locations of the sky.
content.summary: Light anomaly (1/22/12 essie ky)

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home and i was upset for personal reasons when i looked out my window.
i saw a plane passing by the noise made me look up and then i saw the object(s).
i honestly been seeing strange lights and movements the past couple of days so at first i thought maybe its a far away plane. 
the object was hovering as two other went by it seemed as if the 1st object had stopped while thee other two passed by them not to far apart from one another.
than suddenly looked as if it took off in the same direction the other two objects in a wobble or spinning like motion but at a faster really faster rate!
the past few days ive been seen strange objects in the city skies ,on may 6th 12 about 2am-ish ive seen wat at first i thought was star but the movements convinced me it was a star.It was pulsin and had another which seems to be circling it like orbiting..This was another reason that had me constantly looking up now.So when i spotted this one i just knew and felt a sense of unexplainability in me,sorry! all i can do was pull out my phone and got to snap about four pictures i try to get one as close as possible but really blurry. i would like some feedback i would like to know if i am right or wrong? plane? or ufo? i watched it until they were all gone the 1st two seem to just passed right by kind of back to back and the third one hovereed thats the one i actually got a picture of! then after about 2 minutes it took off in a vertical motion. im 98% sure that was not air regular airplane.

thanks
content.summary: Was having a sort of arguement with my wife and suddenly mad looked out my window and saw the object which seem to be hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was on rear deck of home feeding a cat, as i stood up i looked at the planet venus and thought how bright it was. i then saw three bright orange-red orbs traveling from west to east moving about the speed of a med-evact chopper as they flew over my house they faded out completely first the two trailing orbs then the leading one. about a minute later a fourth one traveling in the same direction appeared and as it approached the same location as the others it also faded away. the sky was clear and the moon had not come up at that time.When i first saw them i thought they were military choppers but there weren't any strobe or flashing lights. after i realized what i was seeing i thought that now i have witnessed what i've heard other people describe.I wasn't afraid but just facinated.
content.summary: Three ords in vague triangular formation followed by a fourth a minute later.  all four were bright red-orange and one after the other faded out traveling from west to east

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard taking my great dane (shiloh) out to do her nightly business (9:03 pm). i noticed a very bright light in the sky (60 degrees west of my home) t first thought it was the north star (but it was far too large and too bright!). i then looked 90 degrees up and the north star was almost directly over my house where it is every night. thats when i called my wife (a middle school science teacher) to come out and take a look. she confirmed it was not the north star but something that seemed odd.

a very bright white light the size of an asprin just hovering in 1 spot,and next to it was a 2nd light(s) red and green blinking in a triangular pattern. after about 5 or 6 minute later another 3rd (what looked like a extreamlly fast moving helecoptor with flashing red lights-what i think may have been an air force helecoptor) flew right directly at it,....Then past it....Then it the vanished out of sight. when the helecoptor with the flashing red lights  or whatever it was vanished it gave me a very unsetteling feeling as if something was very wrong.

at apox. 9:36 pm both the asprin and red & green triangular blinking  light just "poof" disappeared. i know this may sound crazy but i know what i saw and i am in a quandry whith very mixed emotions. at this point (9:59 pm) there has not been a reappearence and i need to go lay down for i am feeling very ill-at-ease

thank you for listening and if you had other sightings please call me and let me know for it mught make me feel a little better
craig lospaluto
732 540 9433
content.summary: 2 lights (1 largeer steady white light) next to that (grren & red flashing lights in a triangular pattern

content.detailedDescription:
My neighbors, roommate, girlfriend, and friend (six total individuals) witnessed a large solid bright glowing orange orb in marana. the orb was twice as large as a full moon. we were standing out in the street socializing when i noticed the orb rising. it appeared to be a few streets down and may have been on the ground at one point. it was not confirmed to have landed however because houses and trees obstructed the view at first.
originally we concluded that the orb was nothing more than a candle or light tied to a balloon. this was instantly rejected when the orb began maneuvering. the orb ascended, then descended, then ascended slowly again. the maneuvering seemed rather unstable at first, but the orb finally ascended much farther into the sky and all six of us were able to observe the orb move from our neighborhood south towards the city of tucson at a speed of probably 90-100 mph in a very linear path. we all watched the orb until it was about the size of a small star and eventually faded in the distance over the city of tucson, about 10 miles away. the even lasted about five minutes.
about 30 minutes after the sighting, incredibly strange sounds projected from the tortillita preserve desert down the street. the sound was unlike anything we have ever heard, and we are outside every night when we smoke our cigarettes.
the sound was similar to a dog, but mixed with a high pitched opera singer, and had a slight vibrational low frequency humming during the "barking".
all six of us, from three different houses on the acacia blossom pl., will confirm this sighting.
content.summary: Big solid bright glowing orange orb. not one other characteristic.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my back window when i saw something. i could'nt believe my own two eyes it was beautiful as can be. it had  like a snowflake appearance it was like a glowing white orb.It had to of been about the size of 2 or 3 vw bugs.Ive lived around airports my whole life sky harber l.A.F.B also deervalley airport i know when i see a plane this was not falling it was at a low alt. moving as if the pilot was pushing and letting of the gas peddel at speeds up to 2 -300 mph. here's what really got my attention a min or less after i saw a black or dark gry millatary helocopter i believed to be in persute of the object because it was following in the exact flight path of the ufo. also it was traveling eastbound between glendale and bethanyhome rd. around 43rd ave. if anyone else saw the same thing please leave a post .
content.summary: White gowing orb clearly not of anything we have  possably transparet in nature.Fast moving .Awesome

content.detailedDescription: Looking due west approx 10:20 pm may 10, 2012  i want to say they were in a geometric form and then gathered together at same altitude forming a v flying west. they gathered closer and closer together as if in line going from the 5 on left 5 on right and one in front gathering closer and closer together til in a line making them all form to one bigger light then blip gone.
content.summary: Lights gathering into a v then into one & gone

content.detailedDescription: I was using my computer, then, i looked out the window and saw something, i thought to myself it's a plane, but i didn't hear anything, and i even stand up and tried to get closer it was like a disk, i was surprised, it was going pretty fast but straight, i lost it when it seem like it disappeared.
content.summary: Silently moving fast

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed what can only be described as ufo���s out the back of the coffs harbor region, about 5 hours above sydney on the east coast of australia in 2007. at first i noticed a large object through the trees, with a bunch of colored lights flashing on and off. i assumed it was a truck or road works set up on another hill (as i was on a property at the top of a hill) until i remembered that there was no hill in that direction. as the object maneuvered back and forth for a while, i started scratching helicopter, plane and anything else i could think of off the possibility list as it was too close to be of such size without making any noise. eventually it got to a point where i felt a bit spooked as it didn't make any sense. i ended up jumping in the car to get closer and drove a few kilometres in its direction before i saw it again out over the bush-land. for a while i thought it was made up of two parts, one kind of pulling the other, until they separated and i spent around 45 minutes watching them both move around the sky. they both covered incredible distances with ease and at great speed, moving in all directions including diagonally. they also looked like they were 'playing' with each other as they followed each other around the horizon. at one point they both spiraled upward as though sliding up a twisting water-slide... the size of the crafts, the distances they covered, the blinking, the lack of noise, all of this defied anything that i am aware exists as far as modern human technology goes. when an aero-plane entered the skyline i noticed both crafts blacked out. i thought the show was over, until the aero-plane crossed the sky, faded into the distance and to my surprise both craft's lights returned and i watched them for another good ten minutes. the next day i went to the coffs harbor police station to find out if anyone else had seen or reported them. the police asked me how good the magic mushrooms were! although they didn���t take me seriously i know what i saw and i know how incredible the experience was. it also amazes me how many witness accounts there are across the globe and yet the idea of ufo���s is still considered ���wacky��� or ���silly���. it was a strange feeling to go from ���hearing about��� these bizarre ufo sightings that the main media makes fun of, to becoming someone that had actually seen it with my own eyes. i have been fascinated by their existence ever since.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large obviously mechanical and engineered craft, with flashing lights across it's exterior. the size of a bus or slightly larger at a guess.

content.detailedDescription:
Going to work.
clear day saw in sky.
blimp shaped.
moved across sky quickly.
content.summary: Huge blimplike grey craft moved incredibly fast from west to east.  i viewed from w130 in strongsville appeared to be over parma heights.  amazed by size and speed.

content.detailedDescription:
First, i must say that i have never reported anything like this before, though i have seen things in the sky i couldn't explain...The only reason i even bothered with this report is that it was seen in open clear blue skies and was so obviously not anything i could explain away. i was driving to work at an independent living center where i am an architectural barrier consultant and code enforcer...The sighting took place on a straight road with a clear view of the morning sky... while i was noticing how vivid and blue the sky was i saw something of a flash come into my view heading east at about (and i am estimating here) 4 miles out and about 15,000 feet up (much lower than most jets i see in this area). it slowed from a flash, to a halt in less than a second maybe two seconds...When it stopped i only had time to realize it was really sitting there and that it was reflective to the morning sun before it shot off to the north at a rate of speed that was absolutely insane...In my 42 years i have never seen anything that could do this type of a maneuver...I pulled off to the side of the road to try to see where it went and collect my head a bit...I was absolutely dumbfounded and my mind was racing to come up with anything that could explain what i just saw...Here is what i am sure of...There is no way that was a bird, swamp gas, man made flying machine, meteor or a hallucination...Nothing in our common understanding of g forces and man's limitations against them could explain this one...Wow!! still have goose bumps over it!

do i have proof? no, but i would definitely take a lie detector test!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ncredibly fast metallic object shot into my view halted for a second maybe two then shot off in a northward direction and dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were on the balcony of our apartment in ottawa ontario. he saw this huge orange big ball of light in the sky.We were both kinda like what the heck is thy an stared for a while then it would get smaller&disappear. it was foggy out this night&whenever the light would disappear whenever it was about to reappear the clouds in the sky would light up and then bam the light would b back.It was the scariest thing i had seen really freaked me out. we took a video of it on an iphone but there is no comparison to seeing it in person. this orange light in the sky was huge bigger then any plane we have seen from our balcony in the same area.We had been livin there fo years and go out on the balcony quite often and had never seen anything like that before.We saw that sometime in december 2011 i believe for about an hour long.It would appear&then reappear every few mins and sometimes would go away for like 15 mins then come back it didn't look like it was flying it look like it would like hover in the same place didn't really look like it was moving and we saw it dart across the sky once or twice the first time i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me but the. me and my bf saw it happen again.Also this big huge orange light was bigger in the sky at that far a distance was bigger then a street light in front of us that we could see off the balcony. we had been looking hoping to see it again ever since.May 5 2012 around 9:45-10:25pm my sister and i were sitting on the balcony having a smoke while boyfriend and dad were at our new place right down the street moving stuff as we were moving out that day.My sister was like " oh what is that?" i look up and i was shocked! it was the huge orange ball of light that i had seen before. it really freaked her out because i had told her before what we had seen and showed her the videos.We were both really freaked out because it was exactly what i had seen before. again this huge light was just an orange light no other lights that blinke at all or anything it was almost in the exact location as the one was the last time. we watched it disappear and reappear like it had done previously. the only difference this time was it was not foggy out so it was more clear. i could see a light over top of the water this time not sure if it was a light flashing down or the fact that this light was so huge that it was reflecting off the water. and then out of nowhere a second one appeared and the first one disappeared ! it was the first time we had seen 2 ! i had like no space left on my phone to video tape most but i caught the part on film where the one was there the second one appeared and the first one then disappeared. we watched for about a half an hour watching then disappear and reappear at one point we saw them both side by side in the sky! it also looked like when the one was in the sky&we could see the light across the water we could see this big ball of orange light move towards us slowly it was like in the same spot but would slowly move closer. i called my boyfriend when i saw this and told him to get back over here to see as he had seen it before with me. by the time he got back it was gone. as it was disappearing and reappearing when it was gone it would just simply not reappear. we have videos though we made sure of that. we moved out that day though so i doubt well ever see it again this building blocks the view of where we had seen them twice before.
content.summary: Massive orange light in the sky that would disappear & reappear and then we saw a second one

content.detailedDescription:
Around midnight i heard a weird sound, it was quite strange, jet like just a tad more disturbing, and it felt wrong. so i decided to look out my window, and sound got louder. i looked up and saw the typical stars in the sky that dim in the distance motionless. only one moved to the right and was sort of glued to the other, it is when i went to my room and got my iphone, i needed to record it. while im getting camera ready i look up, the stars was triple the size and getting bigger as it got closer descending to our neighborhood. 
the sound got louder, fellt and sounded like pulsating waves of sound, i immediately felt scared because the object got closer and i saw a clear look as it hovered pass my apartment, did not look nor sound like a jet, plain, helicopter or any other flying vehicle we know. it was definitely ship like, huge, the pulsating lights were under it, like 3 light circles pulsating and as it pulsated emitting the sound. it was disturbing, ship hovered by, then i saw more coming and recorded, i captured about 2 minutes of the sound very disturbing, as well as the light strobes, and on the video u can see the one that moved, hovered and disappeared out of nowhere. im uploading a video here, but i recorded about 8 more i'll upload today. i am still shaken, scared, couldn sleep, noises and hovering stopped at around 3:30am eastern time.

i know for a fact it's ufo, objects behaved like stars first then moved, ascending, descending, fast, then when passing by each other, hovering for a second like communicating then continue moving in opposite directions.

sound were very loud, coming and going as ships were hovering back again. i spotted at least 5 ships that hovered back and forth. and 3 specific ones that were together on a straight line, they would hover a bit and move but always in formation, those were white center, and outer glow was yellow, blue and red.

i have more video footage, hopefully usa releases an official statement, if not i need to submit this info, i want the world to see we are not alone, if we are in for an invasion, last night was definitely a test. as they went and returned for about 3 hours.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Strobbing star like objects loud sound

content.detailedDescription: I was going on a darker road in the country, when i looked up in the sky {like i always do} and seen 4 small fast blinking lights in a triangular formation heading north. i knew they were not planes, and not going the normal east/west...West/east directions. the formation changed a bit, but kept mostly triangular. i had my camera/video and was trying to find a good place to pull over to get some video, but there was nothing. i kept watch as the formation seemed to be going pretty fast, and i was going rather fast also because i wanted to find a spot to get some video. they were blinking very fast white color...No reds or blues....Like tiny stars, but they were not stars.  i kept them in sight until they kinda disappeared, and i finally was able to pull into a parking lot of a church. i couldnt see the triangular formation anymore, but then i saw 2.More of the same things heading north on the same path i had seen the triangle formation...But i heard these as jets..One above..One below and slightly behind. they disappeared, and soon i saw 2 more in the same formation headed in the same direction as the other 2. by this time my brother had joined me, as we were meeting to exchange metal to be powder coated for our business. he saw them also...And couldnt believe it. then we saw 2 of them come back north to south...Going extremely fast! all the time we were seeing regular planes and jets going west to east...East to west, but these jets were flying much faster...Like they were looking for something. it was very cool!
content.summary: Triangular shape

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the big dipper, and was following,(from what i've heard) the line that the handle points to. as i was doing this i observed, just after sirious(?), a star appeared in the void that is following the constellation, shown like a star, then doubled in size and disappeared. the only thing i could think of is that i saw a supernova. then i asked myself; with the naked eye? i know i'm not the only one who saw this. i know what i saw, and if anyone wants to talk to me about it would be much appreciated.
content.summary: Star, doubled in size, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself, my fiance and her sister witnessed a hovering light slowly descend into the mountains past eagle lake on morehead state university's campus.  she lives in a top-floor apartment near eagle lake, and i filmed and observed the object from her rear balcony which has a view of the lake's dam.  

we first observed the object around 10:00pm, and i just pointed it out as an abnormally bright star.  however, my curiosity took hold as my brother-in-law's brother filmed a ufo in paintsville, ky last night.  i observed the light for about 5 minutes from her balcony when it suddenly disappeared and reappeared at a slightly lower elevation.  at this point, i decided to use my iphone to film it to observe what it would do.  for the first short while, it seemed to hover, and pulse.  i had to use a separate app other than the built-in one on the iphone to film so that i could zoom while filming.  i shot 4 separate clips which show the object disappearing, reappearing, changing elevation and pulsating in luminosity.  

the final clip shows the object as it disappears over the treeline of the mountains just past eagle lake.  

the nighttime sky was mostly clear, with only a few wispy clouds in view, none obscuring the object.  venus was in clear sight slightly to the east of the object.  

the only editing i have done to these clips is add text, flipped them to proper orientation and stabilized them slightly in final cut pro.
content.summary: Hovering the descending light over eagle lake

content.detailedDescription:
We had taken the kids to indiana beach for the day. the park was closing and we were walking from the park to the parking lot, we noticed an old couple standing on the walking bridge. i stopped to see what they were looking and pointing at and noticed a bight light in the southeast sky. i was looking at what appeared to be a light that was twice as large as any star that was in the sky. suddenly more lights appeared. at this time the park had shut off all of their lights and the bridge was full of people heading to the parking lot. the light appeared to be just above the tree tops across the lake from where we were all standing. this light then disappeared. a few seconds later more lights appeared at about a 45 degree angle from us and more in the southern sky then when the first light appeared. there were a total of about 4-5 lights at this time and they all would get really bright and then dim. during this whole time we could not hear anything except the frightened people on the bridge who were witnessing this event. these lights formed no certain pattern they had just appeared in the sky and were going from about a star like size to about the size of a penny. these lights held their position for about 30 seconds until they started moving around in the sky. these lights chased each other in weird patterns going from the southern sky to the southeast, then to the southwest, the whole time they would get really bright and then dim. they also would gain and loose altitude in just a matter of a few seconds. it reminded me of what i would think a "dog fight" would look like. the difference being the fact that these lights would appear and disappear and change direction and altitude too quickly to be a jet. everyone watched these light for a few minutes when they all just vanished. after looking for them for about 5-10 seconds, someone noticed that they had moved behind us and were now in the northern sky and were acting same way. they were in the northern sky for about 20-30 seconds when they vanished again and then reappeared back in their original spot in the southern sky. we watched these objects and never heard them make any sounds. after about 10 mins of watching this event, we could hear the sound of jets coming from behind us (the northern sky at this time) and 3 military jets flew right over us (about tree top high) and headed right in the direction of the lights. these lights then shot straight up in the sky and were gone.
we waited on the bridge for about 20 mins to see if anything would return but nothing did. but as we were heading back home, my sons mom (who was in rochester at the time on lake manitou) called to ask us where we were at and if we had seen anything weird. my son told here what we had seen and she said they were out on the pontoon and seen the same thing. rochester is about 60 miles from where we were at and she had seen them.
content.summary: Various number of lights changing directions

content.detailedDescription: Noticed stationary light changing colors. looked thru binoculars and telescope. saw a diamond shape. it remained for over an hour then was gone.I was watching the baseball game and felt like i neede to get up and look out the window and there it was. i thought at first it was a plane but it didnt move. i observed several planes pass by during the time the object was in sight.
content.summary: Spinning diamond shape changing colors

content.detailedDescription:
Received a call from a train electrical engineer friend who wanted me to accompany him to a malfunctioning railroad crossing.  he got a call from the authority that the gates were down on a crossing off rt 28 athol/ thurman area.  we were in warrensburg headed north in route to the location when we both noticed ( 10-10:30 pm) an incredibly super bright white planet-like light/object  hovering stationary at approx 300-500 ft elevation within a mile of where we were.

we were blown away but we were unable to stop because the crossing needed his immediate attention.  as we drove past the ufo, we lost sight of it due to trees and other obstructions in our view.  we were somewhat nervous because it seemed as though the object was very close to where we were going and thought that maybe this is why the railroad gates malfunctioned.

we arrived at the location to check the control box, no immediate evidence of foul play...No evidence of the bright ufo or related phenomena.

we quickly returned to the original sighting location...And it was gone...We wished we had taken a few minutes to film the object but we missed the opportunity.  we stayed and hunted the area for any other activity, but all went quiet and back to business as usual.
content.summary: Super bright white planet-like but 10x larger hovering with slight pulse

content.detailedDescription: I was going to my backyard to get the garbage moved to the street. looking directly east. in the tree tops, i saw a single bright red light moving in my direction (west). at first i thought it was a landing light from a jet aircraft taking off from cleveland hopkins but the light was very red and bright in color. object was moving slowly and continued west until 45 degrees above the horizon, where it stopped moving. i immediatley saw another red light moving in the same direction as the first object , red in color and bright. this second object stopped about 30 degrees above the horizon . at this time both objects are not moving. occaisionaly, the objects would abruptly and i mean abruptly ,change to white  and then back to red. i then saw the third red object approach from the same direction and then stop and hover about 30 degrees above the horizon. from my vantage point they formed a somewhat triangular formation. not a perfect triangle ..The lead object then moved south stopped, then northeast back to towards the other 2 objects. then it stopped again. the three objects then all moved back to the east, i lost sight of the last 2 objects as they went below the tree line in my line of sight. the lead object then went dark. about 30 seconds later the lead object again began to light up with a red color. at this point i ran into the house and got my binoculars. coming back out i saw these 3 objects again were taking  the same path as i described ,for a second time. all were staionary and then the lead and second object began to move towards one another. i looked at them through the binoculars , got  a good focus and could see the objects plainly were round, sphere shaped. these 2 objects were moving together and i thought they were going to collide. i could barely see any space betwen them when they quit moving together. now the objects bagan to move east again and i lost site of the trailing (3rd) object. at this time my wife came out because i was yelling for her. the 3 objects again moved west in our direction my wife was able to see all 3 objects at this time. the objects then began to move away to the east . the lead object stayed behind and hovered while the 2 other objects disappeared from view behind the tree line. this lead object then began moving laterally again to the south and began to dim. i watched through the binoculars and could see there was a definate shape as the light faded to black. conditions were clear sky, no moon, no wind , temp about 50 deg f. no light pollution , as my back yard is pretty dark. i'm 59 years old, i hold a commercial pilots liscense (i do not fly for the airlines but am an active and current pilot). this was a good sighting. the objects never moved at a high rate of speed, but rather slowly the whole time , except when they were stationary. they were not airplanes, as no acquistion strobes were seen. the entire object gave off light. the objects did not travel far in any direction, they seemed to stay in a relativley confined area of the sky .Not sattelites, as they they reversed direction several times.I know what sattelites look like in the night sky. i saw no low flying aircraft before or after this sighting. i did see high altitude jets , however. these objects appeared to be fairly low. i can't gauge how far they were away or how high they were. but these had to have been seen by other people. they were bright and very obvious..Call me at my home if you would like to chat. i will make sure i read the local newspaper to see if anyone else saw these. thanks..Bob
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 bright red objects , sometimes turning white, sometimes turning dark

content.detailedDescription: I came out of my house to go to the store saw this bright white star like light in the the sky it also had a glow around it. i noticed it because it was very bright shining out of the sky. i watched it the whole way to the store and back, when my boyfriend and i got back to the house i said something to him, he kept saying its just a star. it then changed shape to a triangle type shape, at that point my boyfriend became interested in it. we started seeing other lights going up to it and passing by it. our neighbor came out and asked what we were doing, i did not say to much cause i did not want him to think i was crazy, he then looked up and saw it and said its the great eye watching us. he also saw it changing shape, and said see it it looks like rays of lights coming out at the points. my boyfriend and i got in the car to see if we could get closer, we could not! we came back to the house it was still in the sky but had moved a bit to the right, i came inside to get my camera, went back out and it was gone.
content.summary: Large bright white light! star like then changed to triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette as usual..Looking at the stars been doing that ever since i was a kid. so i know the difference between one thing or the other. and there it was an object boomerang shape just passing right on front of me no sound at all light were a bit visible but very difficult to see..It was like greyish..Almost like white pearl..But it was there. i was very surprise to see so low i think about a 1,000 feet hight. i'm pretty sure. a beautifull sight.
content.summary: No sound at all! the thing was huge boomerang shape just beatifull..Almost undetectable.

content.detailedDescription: 9:30 am 5/10/2012 i was driving north thru liepers fork, tn. on my way to work, when a reflective object caught my eye just west of me over the natchez trace parkway. the sun-glare showed that it was slightly banking possibly from an eastward direction to north. i thought it ws a plane at first, but it was too low in the sky. then i realized i couldn't see wings. i decided to try and speed up to get a better look and saw that it too was speeding up slowly then moved to a high rate of speed over the school. as a tall tree passed my view for half a second(i was driving 55 mph) the object was gone. there was no clouds in the sky and no obstructions. this is my first daytime sighting. from the time i saw the object to the time it vanished was approximately 15-20 seconds. i was perplexed at first, then just intrigued and wanting to see better detail, by the time the sighting was over i was in awe and excited. it definitely solidified the existence of these unknown objects for me.
content.summary: West to north reflective object in leipers fork, tn approximately 9:30 am on may 10th 2012

content.detailedDescription: My dog wanted out so i left him out, so i decided to go out i saw an object just to my north, it was too low to be a planet and was so bright it hurt your eyes to look at it, i watched it fall, go right go left and go back up, no normal aircraft can do what it done, i ran in and got my wife and kids, it began noving to the north, it began dimming then getting brighter, it done this several times before turning orange, then it would get bright orange fade, blink out then come back on , we watched it until it vanished.
content.summary: Bright , orange ufo

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside my house smoking a cigarette, something caught my peripheral vision and as soon as i made eye contact with the ufo it took off faster than a fighter jet. i believe it was hovering before i spotted it, but it was not in my line of sight for more than 2 seconds. i looked above the tree line and saw a very bright red circle of light with two beams of yellow golden light coming off each end (looks like this shape basically -o-) only about an inch across in the sky. it was like literally as soon as eye contact was made from me it knew it because it zoomed off to the right behind the treeline. it was a very solid controlled movement like it had no problem changing directions and accelerating. didnt look like solid matter either more of just light, there was no texture almost as if a spotlight was making a very strange shape on the sky (no clouds this night either). i spotted it and it was 100% some object accelerating at extremely high speeds out of my view as soon as i saw it. very strange encounter i didnt really know how to respond afterwards. i was with my brother and a neighbor both of them were facing me so it was behind them. after it happened i got crazy goosebumps and my body was shaking, felt like my head was playing tricks with me but im positive it was something. about 30 seconds after it left i think there was a slight rumble like thunder from very far away im not sure if that is related to the ufo or not. thanks for this website im glad i can share some solid information with others who care. this has really changed how i look at things now.... man, i cant believe i actually saw a ufo
content.summary: Red circular center with 2 gold/yellow beams coming off each end -o- shaped looked like solid light

content.detailedDescription:
Whenever i see an object i automatically think that it is a man-made object until i see the object do something that is unnatural to man-made objects.

on may 9, at approximately 8:00 pm mt., i was in my jacuzzi for about 10 minutes when i noticed a bright object starting north of me heading south.

the object did not appear to be too far away.  it was approximately 20-25 degrees about the horizon looking east.

the object was was solid white, very bright, with no flashing at all.  it was shaped kind of like a mushroom top.  flat on the bottom and curved at the top.  i was watching it travel north to south at a fairly slow speed.  i watched it for 10 seconds.  it made no sound or left no contrail.

there was no other low level aircraft at this time.  there were however light high altitude aircraft flying at this time

at that moment, i took my eyes away for a split second and looked back and the object was gone.  i am not sure if it just disappeared or took off somewhere at a high rate of speed.  all i know is that i kept looking for the object and would not see it again.  

the sky was clear and calm.

i live about 6 miles south of the colorado springs airport and about 2 miles east of fort carson and have seen several different kinds of aircraft.  this object did not act like any aircraft i know of.  i am 22 years retired from the air force so my background on aircraft is pretty extensive.
content.summary: Bright white light, no flashing, moving across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a smoke staring at the sky as usual.  it was a clear day and i could actually see more stars than usual.  all of the sudden an object appeared in the sky.  it had a light blue glow and flew at an incredible speed due west.  then it made a sudden dip and disappeared.  it was amazing and it was my first sighting of something i could not explain.
content.summary: The object was light blue and flew due west and made a sudden dip and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I spend a ton of time in the woods alone at night because i hunt coon dogs for a hobby and i've never seen anything like it. i live in rural northern michigan and there is no light pollution and the moon wasn't up yet. my wife advised me that there was a freeze warning and i should cover the strawberries since they had started to blossom. i had my led coonhunting light on and i was dragging a tarp across the yard to cover up my strawberries. i shined my light on a tall pine tree across the road and saw 3 bright orange objects shining back at me. they looked just like raccoon eyes only bigger and brighter so i turned the light off and they stayed on, then they went out for a few seconds. i shined the tree again and they shined back at me again only much brighter this time. i turned out my light and they stayed on for a few seconds and went out again. i was dumbfounded and confused because when eyes reflect they go out instantly when you turn off the light source. then they lit up again only this time they weren't behind the tree, they were to the right of it and i could tell they were much higher in the sky than i originally thought. this time they stayed on and hovered in the shape of a triangle. then all 3 lights rotated and stopped then went out. i ran into the house and grabbed my video camera and got my wife. when we got back out two orbs lit up a little further south for just a few seconds and went out again but there were two other twinkling lights (didn't look anything like planes) moving north very slowly. they stopped then moved back to the south one following the other making no sound at all then left over the tree line. i managed to catch a few seconds of the sighting on digital video. the "twinkling" crafts didn't appear on the video since they were so far away at that point.

i posted my sighting on facebook and two of my friends also said they saw it but had not planned on telling anyone until they saw my post. one friend was in his house 10 miles west of me near m-68 and m-33 and his wife saw it out the window. he went outside and saw it clearly. he saw 3 bright lights (red, green and white) hovering about 100 yards away then they went out. he said the lights were definitely not an airplane. it was close and made no sound. 

another friend was traveling east on m-68 near m-33 east of afton, michigan. he saw 4 bright orange lights out the window of his truck. they appeared to hover then moved toward onaway. he tried to keep up with it but lost sight of it over the trees. he also saw two "craft" following the lights but they appeared to "twinkle" like a star. he is a fire chief and very credible.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very bright lights above trees. turned on and off. two other moving lights in distance, changed direction.
